Paragraph XS

The Star Citizen sub-project called “Starmap” has been in the works for almost as long as the game itself. As in most games, players need a way to visualize the universe they’re in, and a lot of in-game options were explored.

Quote

Our internal and unofficial goal was to create an in-browser experience which could go toe-to-toe with (and even beyond) what other space sims have done in-game

Jennifer de Wit

Senior Vice President
